WRITING.TEXT: We want to use one platform that can handle simple 1-3 page sites, with the capability to be expanded to more like e-commerce.
Yeah, that is what I was thinking, thanks.

WRITING.TITLE: Django for freelance web dev.
WRITING.TEXT: Is Django a good tool for developing fairly simple websites for clients? I feel that the admin site is a nice feature for these site. If so, could you recommend a Django hosting option?

WRITING.TITLE: Solutions for freelance client web hosting
WRITING.TEXT: My team and I are planning on developing Django based websites for local businesses. We are wondering how to go about hosting these Django sites for clients. Should we have them self manages by clients or should we manage hosting for a monthly fee? If so, what are some good hosts for this?

WRITING.TITLE: The Governments Consumer Data Watchdog

WRITING.TEXT: Great, thanks. I am learning Django right now for freelance web design and I am experienced in Java.

I'm looking into some web development for local businesses or something of the likes.
